      • updateFlight

        boolean updateFlight(Flight flight)
              throws ServiceException
        Update fields value of the flights. Fields available for update: the flight departure time, the flight landing time, the flight departure airport id, the flight destination airport id.
        Parameters:
        flight - Flight
        Returns:
        true if updating was successful
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if updating fail

      • getFlightsListBetweenDates

        java.util.List<Flight> getFlightsListBetweenDates(java.util.Date firstDate,
                                                  java.util.Date secondDate)
                                           throws ServiceException
        Returns the list of all the flights which has departure time between two date
        Parameters:
        firstDate - - minimal date of the range
        secondDate - - maximal date of the range
        Returns:
        list of flights which are in the selected range
        Throws:
        ServiceException
